sentences.english: Learn the Omis technique of Egyptian belly dancing in this free video dance lesson.
sentences.chinese: 埃及學習肚皮舞Omis在此免費視頻舞蹈課技巧。

sentences.english: Learn snake arms in spiritual belly dancing in this free dancing video.
sentences.chinese: 學習肚皮舞蛇的精神武器在這個自由跳舞的視頻。

sentences.english: We report on a patient with segmental rhythmic myoclonus resembling belly dance.
sentences.chinese: 我們報告一個病人節段性肌陣攣節奏類似肚皮舞。

sentences.english: I'm taking flamenco and belly dancing classes.
sentences.chinese: 我要去學佛朗明哥舞和肚皮舞啦。

sentences.english: Spice up the evening by inviting a belly dancer.
sentences.chinese: 通過跳有魅力的肚皮舞來給晚會調味。

sentences.english: New Fitness Trends Include Zumba, Belly Dancing and Hula Hooping.
sentences.chinese: 新的健身趨勢包括尊巴，肚皮舞和呼啦圈運動。

sentences.english: Figure-8 arms in belly dancing requires your fingertips to touch slightly.
sentences.chinese: 圖8肚皮舞武器需要你的指尖觸摸略。

sentences.english: I'm going to rip off all my clothes and do a naked belly dance for the polo players.
sentences.chinese: 我要扯裂所有的衣服爲球員作裸體肚皮舞表演。

sentences.english: It is commonly assumed that a belly dancing bra size is the same as normal bra size.
sentences.chinese: 一般認爲，肚皮舞乳罩與普通類型大小一致。

sentences.english: Bellydance Beats is the only and the essential guide to the world of the belly dance.
sentences.chinese: 這本專輯是唯一和重要引領肚皮舞領域的專輯，呵呵。

sentences.english: the belly dancer mover sensually among the tables.
sentences.chinese: 跳肚皮舞的姑娘風騷地在桌子之間移動着。

sentences.english: Another belly dance combination to try is large hip circles into hip clicks.
sentences.chinese: 另一種嘗試肚皮舞組合成髖關節髖點擊大圈。

sentences.english: Do you have a passion for belly dance?
sentences.chinese: 你有學跳肚皮舞的衝動嗎？

sentences.english: The choochoo shimmy is basically a weighted hip bump in belly dancing.
sentences.chinese: 在喬喬擺動基本上是肚皮舞臀凹凸加權。

sentences.english: Learn how to do the Choo Choo shimmy move when belly dancing in this free video dance lesson.
sentences.chinese: 學習如何做喬喬擺振動時肚皮舞在此免費視頻舞蹈課。

sentences.english: A three-quarter shimmy adds texture to belly dancing.
sentences.chinese: 甲三季度增加了質感，擺振肚皮舞。

definition: twerking, sexually provocative dance involving hip movements while in a low, squatting position
